story.text: Just realized that I used 2017 for many of those dates. Luckily I started journaling late and those dates will never be replicated. Lucky me. Have a mediation today. Also investigating how I can sue Sibanye-Stillwater.

I miss your considerate touch. Your gentle life force. Your strong sense of right and wrong. I do not miss your loss of control in a bad situation. I understand your anger - but do not appreciate your inability to control your anger in any meaningful way. I think it is your dad coming out. That is just a guess.
I hope we can soon find a communication channel through which we can talk and support one another. More than anything, I seek your blessing on my journey and my path.
